title: Phone app issue on Pixel 2xl
content:
During an incoming call if i dnt want to accept a call, earlier i simply press the power button and my screen goes off and the incoming call is there in background which turns to a miss call automatically as i ignored it.

Bug after new update of phone app when i presses the power  button during an incoming call to turn off my screen, my screen turns on automatically and callers details are shown on screen.
 After update version 31.0 i am facing this problem,.
